tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Introduction:
Over the course of 30 days, I had the privilege of undergoing 7 sittings at this remarkable dental clinic. The procedures included the meticulous crafting of a dental bridge, precise cavity fillings, and a comprehensive general dental hygiene checkup.

Here‚Äôs my detailed review structured around the various parameters:

1) Technical Prowess:
I stand in awe of the Dr. Naina Chopra‚Äôs unparalleled technical prowess. The dental bridge, an intricate work of art, seamlessly blends with my smile, a result of their attention to detail. The cavity fillings, expertly performed, are virtually imperceptible. Their proficiency is a testament to their commitment to perfection.

2) Domain Knowledge:
In my experiences with various dental professionals, none have matched the depth of knowledge exhibited by Dr. Naina Chopra. Beyond detailing procedures, they unraveled the origins of my concerns and equipped me with effective oral health strategies. Their dedication to patient education shines brightly.

3) Support Staff (Manisha and Rakhi):
The clinic's warm and supportive team played an integral role in my experience. The receptionists extended a genuine welcome, and the dental assistants, with their patience and reassurance, transformed the visits into comforting journeys. Their camaraderie turned appointments into pleasant conversations.

4) On Time Appointments and Scheduling Structure:
Punctuality is a cornerstone here. The 7 appointments started and concluded precisely, reflecting their commitment to efficient scheduling. This seamless organization radiates respect for patients' time and exemplifies their professionalism.

5) Compassion and empathy:
Amidst their technical finesse, what truly touched me was their boundless compassion. They approached each sitting with empathy, customizing treatments to address my unique concerns. The dentist's attentive listening elevated my comfort, transcending the usual patient-practitioner dynamic.

In culmination, my 30-day journey with this dental practice was transformative. Seven sittings, each an opportunity for excellence, bore witness to their unmatched dedication. From the intricate dental bridge to the artful cavity fillings and the educational checkup, their commitment to holistic dental care is evident. I wholeheartedly recommend this practice‚Äîa sanctuary where skill and compassion converge‚Äîto all seeking extraordinary dental experiences.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
Hi All, if you guys really fear from visiting a doctor for your dental issues... Then Dr. Chopra clinic is the right place for you to get it cured without any doubts..Reason is simple - the expertise & experience they have about their field is above perfection. The way they had patiently explained me the process of treatment and convinced me was helpful. I wish i could have come some years back so that i could have saved my mollar and easily avoided the tremendous pains I had suffered throughout..
Anyways it's never too late and am really happy with the treatment received....thanks a tonnes to both the doctors and the team who had been on toes to make me really comfortable during the treatment..
I never felt the pain during the entire process just because of 2 things, my faith in my " loveable Hanuman üôè and my both my wonderful and amazing Dr's Ashish ji and Naina mam"üëå
Now I have been implanted a cap, did my RCT, got a tooth extracted and most importantly- Over came my fear of those instrument in my mouth üòÑ...
I wish all my luck to the team for keeping up such good work.

review: I am very satisfied with Dr. Naina and Dr. Ashish and would recommend for all sort of dental procedures and dental problems.

I have been visiting dr naina and dr ashish for the last 6 years.
My sister has braces from dr ashish.
And i have got dental implant done for front tooth.
I am very happy with the 
treatment.
I will recommend their clinic to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had got my front teeth refilled by Dr. Naina which was a tedious task as they are overlapping. She took her time and reformed the  teeth structure where one cannot tell if it has a filling. She explained the other options that were available as well. My overall experience at the clinic was very good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had my first root canal treatment with dr Naina she has always been very concerned and friendly. She treatment very well made me very comfortable, in every step we  explain very well including all precautions. I was very stressed but she helped alot.even after treatment for any confusion she is very approachable. I don't regret my decision to visit her for treatment.
